{"id":1075684077,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 month, 3 weeks","timestamp":1697355256,"status":11,"status_display":"Wrong Answer","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/1075684077/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Find the Losers of the Circular Game","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    vector<int> circularGameLosers(int n, int k) {\n        vector<int> losers;\n        bool receivedBall[n+1]; // 1-indexed (Friends are numbered 1-n)\n        memset(receivedBall,false,sizeof(receivedBall));\n        // Simulating the Circular Game\n        for(int i=1,j=1;;i=(i+j*k)%n,j++) if(receivedBall[i]) break;\n        else receivedBall[i]=true;\n        for(int i=1;i<=n;i++) if(!receivedBall[i]) losers.emplace_back(i);\n        return losers;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"find-the-losers-of-the-circular-game","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
